definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items

sentences.english: DNP treatment reduced the alternative respiration pathway capacity.
sentences.chinese: 而DNP處理則降低交替呼吸途徑容量。

sentences.english: EGTA treatments inhibited both pollen tube growth and GN division.
sentences.chinese: EGTA處理則同時抑制花粉管生長和生殖核分裂。

sentences.english: The reason for the accidental failure lies in the unduely designed inlet pipe to the tank.
sentences.chinese: 而油罐進油管設計欠合理則是造成偶然性失效的原因。

sentences.english: religion is 'if you obey, then you will be accepted'.
sentences.chinese: 宗教的理則在於‘你只有順服，纔會被接納。

sentences.english: Veins carry water and nutrients within the leaf.
sentences.chinese: 而紋理則把水和營養傳入葉子中。

sentences.english: Fragment of chromosome was induced mainly by PYM.
sentences.chinese: PYM處理則以染色體斷片爲主。

sentences.english: The fuzzy inference is realized by the self-association capability of networks.
sentences.chinese: 模糊推理則由網絡的自聯想功能完成。
